entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mark more blobs as non-shipping #40050
  • Razor parser confused by using reserved keywords as identifiers #40049
  • suggestion for doc adaptation - Support prerendering with authentication #40048
  • Blazor WebAssembly Auth0 logout fails #40046
  • Expose IServer.Features to DI #40043
    7.0-preview4
  • WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures is null #40042
    7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine ActivityListenersAreCalled #40038
    Test failures
  • Quarantine StartupTimeoutIsApplied #40036
    Test failures
  • MissingMethodException occured when deploying Blazor Server app with 'Trim Unused code' #40033
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ConfirmEmail.cshtml returnUrl not working #40032
  • Web Component - Virtualization - API Modification proposal - ItemsProviderRequest #40031
    Backlog
  • Checkbox always set to checked if using `checked="@(false)"` if Helper function run to set other values first #40026

Closed

  • Add RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39708
    Backlog
  • Kestrel will only bind to an IPEndPoint not an EndPoint #39955
    7.0-preview2
  • EnableAuthenticatorModel shows page even if user was not found #39909
    .NET 7 Planning
  • So, how is this "silent OIDC login" supposed to work? #40022
  • Is there a way to update the user's claims when using OpenID? #40011
  • Receiving 'The feature is not supported' in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate #40025
  • Virtualize working great - Modal implementation causes exponential lag #39834
  • [Blazor] Concurrency build issues on CI #37483
    7.0-preview2
  • Visual Studio 2022 Blazor project builds and runs successfully but publish fails with System.ArgumentException #38186
    7.0-preview2
  • Support multiple event handlers for the same event on the same element #14365
    7.0-preview2
  • Including a NativeFileReference causes a Blazor error in Release mode #39825
  • Blazor WASM: Possible to pass pointer to JavaScript? #40027
  • Blazor Prerendering for Static Web Apps #40023
  • Ambiguous Routes #38380
    7.0-preview2
  • Customize ValidationMessage classes #38528
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Installing aspnetcore-runtime-6.0.1-win-x64.exe fails to detect IIS on Windows Server 2019 and does not install ASPNetCoreModule. #39988
  • .NET 6 Memory Leak/Issue #38722
    Discussions
  • VS shouldn't offer to scaffold MVC controllers inside Blazor client apps #5539
    Discussions
  • blazor errors without ambiguity #39848

PullRequests

Created

  • Renaming DisableImplicitFromServicesParameters option #40047
    area-signalr
  • Support OpenAPI summaries, descriptions, and examples for minimal APIs #40045
  • Update to SDK 7.0.100-preview.2.22103.2 #40041
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Scope ActivityListener in test to not interfere with other tests #40044
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Quarantine StartupTimeoutIsApplied in release/6.0 #40037
    area-runtime, auto-merge, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix Kestrel support for custom EndPoints #40003
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • [docs] Modernize steps in project template README #39949
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `28e1da2` to `14aa11d` #40028
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Quarantine ActivityListenersAreCalled in release/6.0 #40039
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add missing returns in EnableAuthenticator #40040
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Use `-noBuild` in second build steps of test jobs #39998
    area-infrastructure
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Adding support to infer FromServices parameters #39926
    area-mvc
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • Better way to detect "Failed to start the HttpConnection before stop() was called." #40018
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add nullable annotations to Identity.Extensions #40007
    area-identity
  • Activate components by default #39997
    area-blazor
  • Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo #39780
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
